channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Intel ditches human customer support for 'one of the first of its kind in the semiconductor industry' system made up of Copilot-powered AI agents
item.description: Ask Intel is an AI-powered assistant replacing phone-based support and centralizing warranty, troubleshooting, and case management online.

item.title: An accountant won a big jackpot on Kalshi by betting against DOGE
item.description: A tax accountant saw Elon Musk fans bidding up a Kalshi prediction market and saw a sure bet to make easy money.

item.title: Inside the story of the US defense contractor who leaked hacking tools to Russia
item.description: The former boss of a U.S. hacking tools maker was jailed for selling highly sensitive software exploits to a Russian broker. This is how we first learned of his arrest, reported the story, and some of the unanswered questions we still have.

item.title: ‘The brightness does not change’ — Samsung answers our 5 biggest Galaxy S26 Ultra Privacy Display questions
item.description: Samsung just unveiled the Galaxy S26 Ultra, and its new Privacy Display feature is one of its most valuable upgrades in recent years.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra : comment activer l’affichage confidentiel ? Voici toutes les options à connaître
item.description: Voici comment activer l'option d'affichage confidentiel du Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra ainsi que toutes les fonctions pratiques de cette technologie.

item.title: HP says RAM now accounts for more than a third of its PC costs
item.description: The cost of PC components has been skyrocketing as AI infrastructure buildout creates extraordinary demand amid limited supply. HP says that squeeze is now hitting PC memory especially hard, with RAM now accounting for 35 percent of a system’s overall cost. "We did share last quarter that memory and storage costs made up roughly 15 percent to 18 percent of our PC bill of materials, and we now currently estimate this to be roughly 35 percent for the year," said CFO Karen Parkhill on the company's latest earnings call. She also confirmed that part of the company's response will be price increase...

item.title: Le Galaxy S26 Ultra a un mode Océan pour photographier et filmer les profondeurs comme un Pro
item.description: À la toute fin de son Galaxy Unpacked, Samsung a jeté en pâture un tout nouveau mode photo/vidéo pour son Galaxy S26 Ultra : le mode océan.

item.title: Samsung shows off new display tech that adds a privacy screen to apps and notifications
item.description: The new privacy tech uses different types of pixels to let you block certain apps and notifications from being viewed by others.

item.title: Anthropic Rolls Back Safety Protocols as It Waits to Find Out If It’s Being Drafted by the Army
item.description: Launching missiles for defense is fine, apparently.

item.title: Galaxy S26, S26 Plus et S26 Ultra : tout ce qu’il faut savoir pour précommander au meilleur prix les nouveaux fleurons de Samsung
item.description: Ce mercredi 25 février 2026 lève enfin le voile sur les nouveaux fleurons de Samsung : les Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26 Plus et Galaxy S26 Ultra. Les précommandes sont déjà ouvertes et il y a même des réductions.

item.title: Kalshi fined a MrBeast editor for insider trading
item.description: Kalshi, one of several online prediction markets that have exploded in popularity in the last few years, has suspended one of YouTube MrBeast's video editors for insider trading, NPR reports. Besides being suspended from the platform for two years, Kalshi says the editor will also be required to pay a financial penalty that's five times his initial trade size.The editor, Artem Kaptur, traded in markets related to YouTube and specifically, MrBeast. Kalshi says his transactions were initially flagged because of his "near-perfect trading success on markets with low odds, which were statistically ...

item.title: Wearable startup CUDIS launches a new health ring line with an AI-fueled ‘coach’
item.description: The wearable incentivizes healthy behavior with points that can be redeemed for health products.

Preorders are now open ahead of launch, with pricing […]

item.title: Kalshi fined a MrBeast editor for insider trading on markets related to the YouTube star
item.description: Kalshi fined the MrBeast editor, Artem Kaptur, for over $20,000.

item.title: The public opposition to AI infrastructure is heating up
item.description: Public backlash over the data center boom is leading to a variety of draconian policies—including bans on new construction.

item.title: Firing Melissa Barrera Was Very Costly ‘Scream’ Decision
item.description: A new report reveals how much it cost to rewrite the script and how much Neve Campbell was paid to return.

item.title: OpenClaw Users Are Allegedly Bypassing Anti-Bot Systems
item.description: An open source project called Scrapling is gaining traction with AI agent users who want their bots to scrape sites without permission.

item.title: Samsung has unveiled its newest earbuds, the Galaxy Buds Pro 4 — and Best Buy is already offering a free gift card with your purchase
item.description: Samsung's Galaxy Unpacked event unveiled the Galaxy Buds Pro 4, and I've found the best preorder deal: a free $30 gift card with your purchase at Best Buy.

item.title: ‘We are getting it ready': Samsung explains why the Galaxy S26 didn't get a silicon carbon battery upgrade
item.description: A Samsung exec claims the company is getting silicon carbon batteries ready, but that they're still not quite ready for prime-time.

item.title: Senate Grills MAHA Influencer Pick for Surgeon General Over Vaccines, Autism, and Financial Ties
item.description: Casey Means refused to state her opinion on whether vaccines cause autism and suggested most women are not getting informed consent about the birth control pill.

item.title: Anthropic weakens its safety pledge in the wake of the Pentagon's pressure campaign
item.description: Two stories about the Claude maker Anthropic broke on Tuesday that, when combined, arguably paint a chilling picture. First, US Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth is reportedly pressuring Anthropic to yield its AI safeguards and give the military unrestrained access to its Claude AI chatbot. The company then chose the same day that the Hegseth news broke to drop its centerpiece safety pledge.On Tuesday, Anthropic said it was modifying its Responsible Scaling Policy (RSP) to lower safety guardrails. Up until now, the company's core pledge has been to stop training new AI models unless specific safe...

item.title: Waymo to begin testing in Chicago and Charlotte
item.description: Waymo this week will begin mapping and collecting data in Chicago and Charlotte. The move comes as Waymo announces it is currently operating its robotaxis fully autonomously in 10 US cities.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 Pro Review: No BS, Just Great-Sounding Wireless Earbuds
item.description: The Galaxy Buds 4 Pro zero in on the basics and knock most of them out of the park.

item.title: ‘It feels leaps ahead of the other guys’ — the Samsung Galaxy S26 series wins in the AI department, and we’re not the only ones who think so
item.description: We had an early hands-on with the Samsung Galaxy S26 series, and it’s exceeded all our expectations on the AI front.

item.title: Workers with AI skills may get more jobs—but they lose negotiating power in this key department
item.description: According to a new report, companies want employees trained in artificial intelligence—but only to a certain extent. Companies want to hire workers with artificial intelligence skills, but don’t want to pay the premium. Those are the findings from a new report from Payscale, a leading online provider of data on salaries and compensation.

item.title: Larry Summers resigns from Harvard as the university reviews his ties to Epstein
item.description: Summers said it was a difficult decision and expressed gratitude to the students and colleagues he worked with over 50 years. Former U.S. Treasury Secretary Larry Summers will resign from teaching at Harvard University amid a campus review of his ties to Jeffrey Epstein, the university announced Wednesday.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 : on a calculé les hausses de prix en France et ça fait mal
item.description: Samsung a dévoilé sa gamme Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26 Plus et Galaxy S26 Ultra. On connaît les prix officiels en euros en France, et la facture est salée.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 | Au tour de Samsung de se lancer dans l’IA agentique
item.description: Le Canada est un marché du sans-fil assez particulier. Il échappe à l’invasion de marques chinoises de téléphones très sophistiqués qui a pris d’assaut le reste de la planète. Il est dominé par deux joueurs et demi : Apple, Samsung… et Google. Ça pourrait être une position difficile pour Samsung, mais la marque coréenne pense avoir un as dans sa manche avec son tout nouveau Galaxy S26....

item.title: Now Nudge : le coup de pouce IA de One UI 8.5 sur Galaxy S26
item.description: Now Nudge est une fonctionnalité IA intégrée à One UI 8.5 sur Galaxy S26, offrant des suggestions intelligentes en temps réel. Elle facilite le partage de photos et optimise la gestion de l'agenda en proposant des alternatives de dates disponibles.

item.title: Braze Xbox test message spams phones: What we know
item.description: In apparent test fluke, the Xbox app has sent users dozens of spam messages, prompting some to delete or mute the app.

item.title: March's PS Plus Monthly Games include Monster Hunter Rise and Slime Rancher 2
item.description:
Sony just divulged the list of PlayStation Plus Monthly Games for March, and there's a little something for everybody. These will all be playable on March 3 for subscribers on any tier. After downloading, the games will stay in a player's library as long as the subscription remains active.
First up, there's Monster Hunter Rise. This was initially a Nintendo Switch exclusive before making the jump to other platforms. This is a decent Monster Hunter game with a focus on verticality. There are tools to quickly scale large cliffs and engage in aerial combat. It can be played solo or via a four-pe...

item.title: HP says the memory chip crunch isn't going anywhere soon - and also warns of PC sales slump
item.description: AI-induced memory shortages and increasing costs won't make PCs cheaper any time soon, HP warns.

item.title: The 2026 National Design Awards are steeped in climate and craft
item.description: The Cooper Hewitt Smithsonian Design Museum has announced the winners of the 2026 National Design Awards. At a time of broken climate pledges and an economy-wide bearhug of automation and artificial intelligence, the dominant themes of the recently announced 2026 National Design Awards—climate action, sustainability, dedication to craft—are a refreshing reset....

item.description: It's not the flashiest deal, but if you need a new pair of our favorite earbuds for iPhone owners, you can snag them at a slight discount.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 vs. Galaxy S25: What’s changed and which one should you buy?
item.description: Following Samsung’s Unpacked event, the Samsung Galaxy S26 is available for pre-order, and it looks very familiar. That is not necessarily a bad thing. Like recent updates in the Galaxy S line, Samsung is refining its flagship rather than dramatically reinventing it. Both phones share a lot of core DNA, including compact designs, high-refresh AMOLED displays and similar camera hardware. The S26 does introduce a handful of meaningful updates, however, including a slightly larger battery and newer software out of the box. Those changes also come with a higher starting price: the Galaxy S26 begin...

item.title: 'This is one feature we can't wait to try' — 6 major Galaxy S26 updates for the Ultra and its siblings that could change how you use your phone
item.description: Samsung just revealed a new collection of Galaxy S26 smartphones featuring new looks, new materials, new cameras, and lots of AI options. Here are the highlights.

item.description: Samsung has two new pairs of Samsung Galaxy Buds4, but I'd only recommend one of them.

item.title: La meilleure idée du Galaxy S26 Ultra ne se voit littéralement pas
item.description: Le Galaxy S26 Ultra introduit un écran avec un filtre de confidentialité intégré, rendant illisible le contenu pour les regards indiscrets. Ce filtre fonctionne en éteignant certains pixels, offrant deux niveaux de confidentialité qui floutent ou assombrissent l'écran selon l'angle de vue. Cette technologie innovante n'est pas un simple accessoire, mais une fonctionnalité intégrée, offrant une sécurité accrue sans compromettre l'usage du smartphone. Nous avons pu l'essayer en amont de la présentation du Galaxy S26 Ultra....

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 vs. S26+ vs. S26 Ultra: Comparing the three new phones
item.description: Samsung has officially unveiled the Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+ and Galaxy S26 Ultra, and the company is once again leaning heavily on AI, camera upgrades and refined hardware to move the lineup forward. While the overall design remains familiar, there are some meaningful differences between the three models, particularly when it comes to display tech, charging speeds and camera hardware. Across the board, the S26 family is powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 for Galaxy chip and runs Android 16 with One UI 8.5. Samsung is also doubling down on Galaxy AI features like Now Brief, Now Nudg...

item.title: Galaxy S26 Ultra : le nouveau mode stabilité rapproche votre smartphone d’une GoPro
item.description: Les Galaxy S26 sont enfin officiels ! Avec ses nouveaux smartphones, Samsung inaugure un nouveau mode vidéo qui verrouille l’horizon. Pensé pour les scènes très mouvementées, ce mode rapproche votre téléphone d'une véritable GoPro. On vous explique comment ça marche.

item.title: Galaxy S26 : des hausses de prix jusqu’à 200 €… mais Samsung abandonne enfin les 128 Go
item.description: Ce sera le refrain de l'année : le prix des smartphones, et d'à peu près tous les appareils électroniques grand public, augmente en raison de la flambée des coûts de la mémoire. Samsung ne fait pas exception à la règle avec la nouvelle gamme Galaxy S26, mais néanmoins le constructeur a quelques arguments pour justifier la valse des étiquettes.

item.title: How to pre-order the Samsung Galaxy S26 phones and Galaxy Buds 4
item.description: During its Unpacked event today, Samsung announced three new Galaxy S-series phones as well as the latest generation of its earbuds, the Galaxy Buds 4 and Galaxy Buds 4 Pro. Pre-orders are now open and the new devices are set to ship March 11. As expected, this year’s models aren’t drastically different from last year’s, but all the phones are equipped to better handle the Galaxy AI experiences such as Now Nudge that offers suggestions based on your activities and a more conversational assitant in Bixby (or Gemini or Perplexity depending on your preferance). Engadget’s own Sam Rutherford is on...

item.title: Google announces new Android AI features coming to the Galaxy S26 and Pixel 10 series
item.description: Google unveiled a new batch of Android updates, including more Gemini-powered tools and improved scam detection features at Samsung’s Galaxy S26 launch on Wednesday. A new feature in the Gemini app will let users hand off multi-step tasks, like ordering a rideshare or building a grocery cart. The feature, which will first arrive in beta, runs in the background while users perform other tasks. Gemini's progress can be monitored live via notifications, so users can see what it's doing and jump in at any time. Google Google says this feature will initially be limited to certain food, grocery or r...

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 hands-on: A lot more of the same for a little more money
item.description: As we prepare to leave the winter months, Samsung announced another family of Galaxy S flagships for those looking to upgrade. As usual, the company put its best components and features into the Galaxy S26 Ultra, but it also added more to the base S26 and S26+. The company has hit its groove with its smaller (and cheaper) flagships, delivering solid devices with increasingly better cameras, occasionally even offering feature parity with its most expensive smartphone. In 2026, that’s what we’re getting, with the 6.3-inch S26 ($899) and 6.7-inch S26+ ($1,099). Both phones are more expensive than...

It's called task automation, and it starts with a prompt to […]

While the Ultra model gets a new Privacy Display and avoids a price hike, Samsung's base models are largely software updates that cost more than the outgoing models. Don't get […]

item.title: Hands on: I’m super impressed with the Galaxy S26 Ultra’s new Privacy Display
item.description: Maybe it's a reflection of just how slow hardware innovation has been, but the Galaxy S26 Ultra's new Privacy Display, which limits the screen's viewing angle to keep any would-be peepers away, left me totally impressed. It's not a brand-new technology - we've seen it before in laptops - and it was leaked thoroughly before […]

item.title: Samsung's Galaxy S26 Ultra offers a subtle set of hardware improvements
item.description: Samsung has announced the latest version of its flagship smartphone, the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra, and just like last year, the high-end phone is where the company is making some of its biggest changes. The S26 Ultra includes a new processor, a new privacy-focused display technology, an improved camera system and like Samsung's other phones, a crop of new AI-powered software features.On first blush, the Galaxy S26 Ultra isn't all that different from the Galaxy S25 Ultra. Samsung is still using a 6.9-inch QHD+ AMOLED screen, with an 120Hz refresh rate and support for an S Pen stylus. The S26 Ul...

item.title: Samsung's redesigned Galaxy Buds 4 lineup has retooled sound, improved ANC and new features
item.description: Samsung isn’t waiting a full year to reveal its latest Galaxy Buds. The company debuted the Galaxy Buds 4 and Galaxy Buds 4 Pro at its Galaxy S26 Unpacked event where the hot topic was three new phones. When it comes to Samsung’s earbuds, the company has overhauled the shape and design while improving sound quality, active noise cancellation (ANC) and adding new features. As always, the best of what the Galaxy Buds 4 lineup has to offer will be reserved for people with a recent Samsung phone. While the company is keeping its AirPods-esque “blade” design, it retooled that element to ditch the ...

item.title: Everything announced at Samsung Unpacked: Galaxy S26 lineup and more
item.description: Mobile World Congress is right around the corner, but Samsung got out ahead of many rivals that will be showing off new handsets at that event by running the latest edition of Unpacked on Wednesday. The company took the opportunity to reveal the Galaxy S26 lineup, which includes the base S26, the S26+ and the S26 Ultra. We've got some hands-on impressions of all three handsets as well.In addition to those, Samsung announced the Galaxy Buds 4 along with (you guessed it) some AI updates. Here's a look at everything Samsung announced at the latest Unpacked:Galaxy S26 and S26+ Sam Rutherford for E...

item.title: Google's Circle to Search can now identify multiple objects in an image
item.description: To coincide with the release of Samsung's new Galaxy S26 family of phones, Google is pushing out a small but meaningful update to Circle to Search. As a reminder, Circle to Search allows you to carry out a Google Search from almost anywhere on your phone. Just tap and hold your device's home button, and then circle the passage or image you want to know more about. With previous iterations of Circle to Search, the tool's underlying AI system was limited to searching against a single object in an image. Now, thanks to Gemini 3, it can scan and identify multiple objects at the same time. Naturall...

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra hands-on: Meaningful tweaks plus a slick new Privacy Display
item.description: Last year, it felt like Samsung relied a bit too much on AI when trying to convince people to upgrade to its flagship phone. And while there’s no shortage of features that utilize machine learning on the new Galaxy S26 Ultra, it feels like Samsung has done a much better job of filling out the rest of the phone’s kit with fresh hardware, faster charging and a more cohesive design. It’s still rather expensive, but its price has stayed flat year-over-year at $1,300, which when combined with everything else makes it a much more attractive package than its predecessor. Design and displaySamsung’s U...

item.title: Samsung's S26 and S26+ offer familiar designs, Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chips and new software features
item.description: The wait is over. At its Unpacked event today, Samsung took the wraps off its new S26 family of phones. Unlike the S26 Ultra, the S26 and S26+ represent mostly iterative updates. Samsung has tweaked the design of the two devices, making it so they share the same rounded corners of their more expensive sibling. Additionally, the S26 has a slightly larger 6.3-inch AMOLED display and a higher capacity 4,300mAh battery inside. As for the S26+, it still has a 6.7-inch screen and 4,900mAh battery. Like in years past, Samsung is depending on new and expanded software capabilities rather than updated ...

item.title: A total lunar eclipse will turn the Moon red on March 3. Here’s who can see it
item.description: A total lunar eclipse will peak in the early morning hours of March 3, tinting the Moon a deep red across much of the Americas. Next week, a rare celestial event will take to the skies. On March 3, amateur astronomers will get to witness a blood moon and a worm moon all at once.

item.title: Samsung lance le Galaxy S26 Ultra un smartphone taillé pour anticiper vos désirs
item.description: Samsung a dégainé son Galaxy S26 Ultra, fer de lance d'une gamme qui cherche son second souffle. Plus fin, plus léger et dopé à l'IA agentique, le terminal ultra-premium du Coréen s'offre quelques ajustements techniques bienvenus, notamment sur la vitesse de charge et l'ouverture de ses capteurs photo.

item.title: Voici les nouveaux Samsung Galaxy S26 : une évolution (trop) tranquille et une facture trop salée
item.description: Samsung vient de lever le voile sur ses nouveaux Galaxy S26 et S26 Plus et l'un des deux nous semble déjà plus intéressant que l'autre.

item.title: L’écran confidentiel du Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra change la donne et j’ai adoré : voici ma prise en main
item.description: J'ai pris en main le Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra qui m'a fait une forte impression avec son impressionnant écran à l'affichage confidentiel.

item.title: Everyone is obsessed with this suction vibrator (including us). Grab our favorite clit vibe for $90 off.
item.description: As of Feb. 25, you can get the Nancy Lem Clitoral Massager for just $66.75 with code LEM25. That's a $92.25 price cut.
